mapper.select: select ID, insideCode, settled_account_num, unsettled_account_num, org_num, area_num, loan_type_num, housing_loan_num, car_loan_num, personal_biz_loan_num, nor_num, overdue_num, max_gran_limit, max_loan_limit, settled_limit, unsettled_limit, overdue_180_principal, overdue_180_unpaid, overdue_180_single_principal, overdue_180_single_unpaid, total_overdue_num, single_overdue_max, five_category_most_type, ear_loan_time, latest_repay_time from zh_loan where insideCode = #{insideCode}
